languages.text: "Ну что же? Что будете делать с этими... легковерными, Лорд-капитан?"
"Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: "Ну что же? Что будете делать с этими... легковерными, Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: "Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible fools, Lord Captain?"
"Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible fools, Lord Captain?"
"Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"
"Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"
"Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: 「さて…どうしましょう？この…愚か者たちをどうするおつもり、ロード・キャプテン？」
languages.original_text: "Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: 「さて…どうしましょう？この…愚か者たちをどうするおつもり、ロード・キャプテン？」

languages.text: « Bon... Et maintenant ? Qu'allez-vous faire de ces imbéciles complètement crédules, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
languages.original_text: "Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: « Bon... Et maintenant ? « Qu'allez-vous faire de ces imbéciles complètement crédules, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »

languages.text: “好吧……现在怎么办？你打算怎么处理这些……随随便便上当受骗的白痴，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: "Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: “好吧……现在怎么办？你打算怎么处理这些……随随便便上当受骗的白痴，舰长大人？”

languages.text: «Bueno... ¿ahora qué? ¿Qué va a hacer con estos... tontos de remate, Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: "Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno... ¿ahora qué? ¿Qué va a hacer con estos... tontos de remate, Lord Capitán?».

languages.text: "Nun ... was jetzt? Was werdet Ihr mit diesen ... diesen leichtgläubigen Narren tun, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: "Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun ... was jetzt? Was werdet Ihr mit diesen ... diesen leichtgläubigen Narren tun, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: "Ee, şimdi ne olacak? Bu beyinsiz salaklarla ne yapacaksın Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: "Well... what now? What are you going to do with these... these gullible idiots, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: "Ee, şimdi ne olacak? Bu beyinsiz salaklarla ne yapacaksın Lord Kaptan?"
